name: Neutron and the Tri-Spark
description:
Neutron is a action maze runner where you will guide our hero Neutron on an adventure to collect the energy orbs of the Tri-Spark. While avoiding capture by the security bots and using energizing orbs to table the tables to advance to the next stage.

Key Features

Collect Orbs and Avoid Bots


Use Energize Orbs For Powerup


Diverse and Unique Enemy Types
